original_title: Man survives assassination attempt in Ambalangoda
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police said that motorcycle gunmen opened fire at a man in Thaldena, Ambalangoda on Thursday (25) night.
Sri Lanka Police said that the motorcycle gunmen had opened fire when the man was returning from a wedding with his seven-year-old son on a motorcycle.
Police said that when the shots were fired, he had jumped off the motorcycle with his son, and the gunmen missed the target.
